title: Zesty noodle salad
ingredients: ['425g dried soba noodles', '1 1/2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil', '75ml rice vinegar', '75ml soy sauce', '1 lime, zest only', '1 lime, juice only', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons crushed chillies or to taste', '1 carrot, grated', '4 tablespoons coarsely chopped salted peanuts', '25g fresh coriander, chopped']
